translation.expressConsentToAllowBedr: Patient Consent Form for Data Processing and Sharing
translation.iHereByGiveMyExplicit: I hereby give my explicit consent to the processing and sharing of my personal, sensitive, and special category data, as outlined below, for the purposes of my medical care and necessary administrative support:
translation.processingAndSharing: 1. Processing and Sharing with Medical Staff
translation.consentToProcessingAndSharing: I consent to the processing and sharing of my personal, sensitive, and special category data, including health-related information, with healthcare professionals (ophthalmologists, optometrists and allied medical staff) for the purposes of diagnosis, treatment, and ongoing care.
translation.administrativeStaff: 2. Processing and Sharing with Administrative Staff
translation.iUnderstandAdministrativeStaff: I understand that some of my data may need to be shared with administrative staff, but only to the extent necessary to manage support requests, including handling billing and managing medical records.
translation.acknowledgeThatMyData: I acknowledge that my data will only be used for the purposes of providing healthcare services and related administrative tasks, and will not be shared with third parties unless required by law or necessary for my care.
translation.iHaveRightToWithdrawMyConsent: I understand that I have the right to withdraw my consent at any time and to request access to or correction of my personal data, in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
translation.bySigningBelow: By signing below, I confirm that I have read and understood this consent form and voluntarily agree to the processing and sharing of my data as described above.
translation.AgreeToBookAnEyeDoctor: I agree to Book an eye doctor
translation.expressConsentToAllowBedrToUse: Express Consent to allow BEDR to use your anonymised scan and diagnosis for research purposes
translation.expresslyConsentToMyAnonymisedImagesandD: I, {{name}}, expressly consent to my anonymised images, data and diagnosis being used by bookaneyedoctor.co.uk for research and educational purposes.
translation.WeWouldLikeToSendYouFurtherInformationAb: We would like to send you further information about the services we provide. We will never share your details with anyone else. Please tick to receive information relevant to you
translation.expressConsentToAllowBedrToShare: Express Consent to allow BEDR to share your diagnosis report with another person.
translation.expressConsentToMyOptometrist: I, {{name}}, expressly consent to my optometrist sharing my diagnosis report with the following person.
translation.ipadAgreeBooktermsandPrivacy: Please tick the box to indicate acceptance of our terms & conditions and privacy policy.

translation.ethnicityInfoTitle: Why do we need to know your ethnicity?
translation.ethnicityDescription: Three particular ethnicities (Caucasian, East Asian and African) are relevant to the diagnosis of certain eye conditions. We use 'non-relevant ethnicity' to mean any ethnicity which is not relevant to eye diagnosis, ie. any ethnicity other than Caucasian, East Asian or African.
translation.moreDescription: If your ethnicity is not represented in our list please choose the one which is closest. If your ethnicity does not include any of the relevant ethnicities, please choose 'Non-relevant ethnicity'.
